EmailTemplate.name: GAS Order Approval Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: A New Gas Products Order "{!Order_Request__c.Name}" has been approved by a Branch Chief
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
A New Gas Products Order been submitted by {!Order_Request__c.OwnerFirstName} {!Order_Request__c.OwnerLastName} and has passed Branch Chief review.
To access this new order, double-click this DocLink: {!Order_Request__c.Link}
Thank You.
